name: Fang of the Great Wolf
description: A large, formidable creature resembling a wolf, it possesses significant physical strength and resilience, with sharp fangs and a predatory appearance.
memorable: Its ability to grow in size and swallow prey makes it a menacing opponent.
goals: Predation and dominance over its territory and foes.
relations: Related to other large predatory creatures, often encountered in packs.
environment: Typically found in forests or mountainous regions.
strengths: High hit points, exceptional melee attacks, and the ability to grapple foes.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, reliance on melee combat, limited damage resistances.
attacks: Powerful bite attack that deals piercing damage, can grapple and restrain smaller targets.
most_powerful_ability: Might of the Great Wolf allows it to enlarge itself and swallow prey.
senses: Possesses keen hearing and smell, granting advantage on Perception checks related to these senses.
skills: Proficient in perception, allowing it to effectively identify threats in its surroundings.
additional_information: Grapples Medium or smaller creatures with its bite.
Can only swallow one creature at a time.
Swallowed creatures take acid damage while inside.
test_queries: large wolf-like creature with swallowing ability
ferocious predator that grapples and restrains
cunning beast that grows in size during combat
wolf monstrosity that uses keen hearing to hunt
tactical large creature with significant hit points
